title: The Red Envelope
description: The hot weather brings out the crazy in the Latino neighborhood of Hackleberry, Pennsylvania. Eva Cordoba, a first-year middle school teacher, is trying to plan her wedding when her former best friend, Vicky Nogales, shows up. Vicky's visit happens to coincide with the threat of a murderer who warns his victims with a red envelope before he kills them. When the local police don't find out who is taking out their friends, it is up to Vicky and Eva to leave the past behind and find the killer-before he finds them. A story of loss and renewal, The Red Envelope combines suspense, humor, and an insightful glimpse into human nature.
author: Amanda Lima
